mapper.select: select sa.product_id,sa.sale_attr_id,sa.sale_attr_name,sav.id as sale_attr_value_id,sav.sale_attr_value_name,if(ssav.sku_id,1,0) as isChecked from pms_product_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value sav on sa.product_id = sav.product_id and sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id and sa.product_id = #{productId} left join pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav on ssav.sale_attr_value_id=sav.id and ssav.sale_attr_id=sav.sale_attr_id and ssav.sku_id=#{skuId}
